<template>
  <n-modal
    v-model:show="showModal"
    class="custom-card"
    preset="card"
    :style="bodyStyle"
    title="借阅图书"
    :mask-closable="false"
    size="huge"
    :bordered="false"
    :segmented="segmented"
  >
    <template #header-extra>
    </template>


  </n-modal>
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent} from "vue";

export default defineComponent({
  props:[
      book,
      showModal],
  methods:{

  },
  data(){
    return{
    }
  },
  setup() {
      function funBook(){

        //axios发送AJAX请求


        //请求接收完毕 登录成功

        //登录失败
    }
      

    return {
      funBook,
      bodyStyle: {
        width: "600px"
      },
      segmented: {
        content: "soft",
        footer: "soft"
      },
    };
  }
});

</script>
